Tacium Poker APIÂ 1.0.0
  • Apache 2.0
  • application/json

The communication betweeen Tacium Poker Clinet and Tacium Poker Server.

Servers

  • TBD/ws/playerwsplay

    Connection with the game emulator

  • TBD/ws/table?id=1wswatch

    Connection with the development API

Operations

  • PUB test

    The test channel.

    Test publish messages

    Accepts the following message:

    Ping

    Pings the server

    object
    msg
    string
      Allowed values:
    • "ping"
    object

    Additional properties are allowed.

    Additional properties are allowed.

    Examples

    {
  "msg": "ping",
  "data": {}
}
    This example has been generated automatically.

  • SUB test

    The test channel.

    Test subscribe messages

    Accepts the following message:

    Pong

    Pong response to client's Ping

    object
    msg
    string
      Allowed values:
    • "pong"
    object

    Additional properties are allowed.

    Additional properties are allowed.

    Examples

    {
  "msg": "pong",
  "data": {}
}
    This example has been generated automatically.

  • PUB login

    The login channel.

    Login publish messages

    Accepts one of the following messages:

    • #0Login

      Login request

      object
      msg
      string
        Allowed values:
      • "login"
      object
      token
      string

      an authentication JWT token

      Additional properties are allowed.

      Additional properties are allowed.

      Examples

      {
  "msg": "login",
  "data": {
    "token": "string"
  }
}
      This example has been generated automatically.
    • #1Guest

      Guest request

      object
      msg
      string
        Allowed values:
      • "guest"
      object
      daemon
      boolean

      whether the guest should remain active after the user logout

      Additional properties are allowed.

      Additional properties are allowed.

      Examples

      {
  "msg": "guest",
  "data": {
    "daemon": true
  }
}
      This example has been generated automatically.

  • SUB login

    The login channel.

    Login subscribe messages

    Accepts one of the following messages:

    • #0Login status

      Login status

      object
      msg
      string
        Allowed values:
      • "login_status"
      object
      logged_in
      boolean

      whether the user is logged in

      account
      string

      the account id

      Additional properties are allowed.

      Additional properties are allowed.

      Examples

      {
  "msg": "login_status",
  "data": {
    "logged_in": true,
    "account": "string"
  }
}
      This example has been generated automatically.
    • #1Guest status

      Guest status

      object
      msg
      string
        Allowed values:
      • "guest_status"
      object
      logged_in
      boolean

      whether the user is logged in

      daemon
      boolean

      whether the guest is daemon

      Additional properties are allowed.

      Additional properties are allowed.

      Examples

      {
  "msg": "guest_status",
  "data": {
    "logged_in": true,
    "daemon": true
  }
}
      This example has been generated automatically.

  • PUB state

    The state channel.

    State publish messages

    Accepts the following message:

    Sync state

    Requests the server to synchronize state

    object
    msg
    string
      Allowed values:
    • "sync_state"
    object

    Additional properties are allowed.

    Additional properties are allowed.

    Examples

    {
  "msg": "sync_state",
  "data": {}
}
    This example has been generated automatically.

  • SUB state

    The state channel.

    State subscribe messages

    Accepts the following message:

    State

    Sends current state to the client

    object
    msg
    string
      Allowed values:
    • "state"
    object
    uid: State
    object
    uid: Game
    id
    string

    Game ID.

    max_players
    integer

    Max number of players on the table.

    small_blind
    number

    The small blind amount.

    big_blind
    number

    The big blind amount.

    button_seat
    integer
    uid: Seat

    A number that indicates the players seat on the table.

    • 0 - no seat
    • 1 - left most seat
    • 2 - the seat to the right of seat 1
    • etc.
    hero_seat
    integer
    uid: Seat

    A number that indicates the players seat on the table.

    • 0 - no seat
    • 1 - left most seat
    • 2 - the seat to the right of seat 1
    • etc.

    Additional properties are allowed.

    object
    uid: Scene
    background
    string

    Scene background ID.

    table
    string

    Scene table ID.

    deck
    string

    Scene cards deck ID.

    Additional properties are allowed.

    array<object>
    uid: PlayerInfo
    seat
    integer
    uid: Seat

    A number that indicates the players seat on the table.

    • 0 - no seat
    • 1 - left most seat
    • 2 - the seat to the right of seat 1
    • etc.
    name
    string

    Player's name

    avatar
    string

    Player's avatar ID.

    cerebo
    string

    Player's cerebo ID.

    object
    uid: PlayersState
    object
    uid: NextPlayer
    seat
    integer

    A number that indicates the players seat on the table.

    • 0 - no seat
    • 1 - left most seat
    • 2 - the seat to the right of seat 1
    • etc.
    time
    integer

    remaining time for next player to play in seconds

    Additional properties are allowed.

    villain
    integer

    A number that indicates the players seat on the table.

    • 0 - no seat
    • 1 - left most seat
    • 2 - the seat to the right of seat 1
    • etc.
    array<object>
    uid: PlayerState
    seat
    integer
    uid: Seat

    A number that indicates the players seat on the table.

    • 0 - no seat
    • 1 - left most seat
    • 2 - the seat to the right of seat 1
    • etc.
    active
    boolean

    Whether the player is active

    Additional properties are allowed.

    object
    uid: Cards
    object
    array<string>
    uid: Card
    Items:
    string
    uid: Card

    2 characters string representing a card. Each card is composed of a Rank [23456789JTQKA] and a Suit [shdc]. Examples:

    • 'As' is Ace pf spades.
    • '8h' is the Eight of hearts.

    A unique card is '--' which represents the card's back (a hidden card). An empty string, or null card, means no card.

    array<string>
    uid: Card
    Items:
    string
    uid: Card

    2 characters string representing a card. Each card is composed of a Rank [23456789JTQKA] and a Suit [shdc]. Examples:

    • 'As' is Ace pf spades.
    • '8h' is the Eight of hearts.

    A unique card is '--' which represents the card's back (a hidden card). An empty string, or null card, means no card.

    array<string>
    uid: Card
    Items:
    string
    uid: Card

    2 characters string representing a card. Each card is composed of a Rank [23456789JTQKA] and a Suit [shdc]. Examples:

    • 'As' is Ace pf spades.
    • '8h' is the Eight of hearts.

    A unique card is '--' which represents the card's back (a hidden card). An empty string, or null card, means no card.

    Additional properties are allowed.

    array<object>
    uid: PlayerCards
    seat
    integer
    uid: Seat

    A number that indicates the players seat on the table.

    • 0 - no seat
    • 1 - left most seat
    • 2 - the seat to the right of seat 1
    • etc.
    array<string>
    uid: Card
    Items:
    string
    uid: Card

    2 characters string representing a card. Each card is composed of a Rank [23456789JTQKA] and a Suit [shdc]. Examples:

    • 'As' is Ace pf spades.
    • '8h' is the Eight of hearts.

    A unique card is '--' which represents the card's back (a hidden card). An empty string, or null card, means no card.

    Additional properties are allowed.

    object
    uid: Chips
    pot
    number

    the main pot size

    array<number>
    Items:
    number

    a side pot

    table_sum
    number

    the main pot size

    array<object>
    uid: PlayerStack
    seat
    integer
    uid: Seat

    A number that indicates the players seat on the table.

    • 0 - no seat
    • 1 - left most seat
    • 2 - the seat to the right of seat 1
    • etc.
    sum
    number

    the main pot size

    array<object>
    uid: PlayerStack
    seat
    integer
    uid: Seat

    A number that indicates the players seat on the table.

    • 0 - no seat
    • 1 - left most seat
    • 2 - the seat to the right of seat 1
    • etc.
    sum
    number

    the main pot size

    array<object>
    uid: Collect
    seat
    integer
    uid: Seat

    A number that indicates the players seat on the table.

    • 0 - no seat
    • 1 - left most seat
    • 2 - the seat to the right of seat 1
    • etc.
    sum
    number

    the main pot size

    collect_type
    string
      Allowed values:
    • "win"
    • "split_win"
    • "side_pot"
    • "split_side_pot"
    • "uncalled_bet"

    Additional properties are allowed.

    array<object>
    uid: PlayerAction
    seat
    integer
    uid: Seat

    A number that indicates the players seat on the table.

    • 0 - no seat
    • 1 - left most seat
    • 2 - the seat to the right of seat 1
    • etc.
    object
    uid: Action
    type
    string
    uid: ActionType
      Allowed values:
    • "Raise"
    • "Call"
    • "Fold"
    • "Check"
    • "Bet"
    sum
    number
    uid: ChipsSum

    amount of chips

    fold
    boolean
    allin
    boolean

    Additional properties are allowed.

    array<object>
    uid: PlayerReaction
    seat
    integer
    uid: Seat

    A number that indicates the players seat on the table.

    • 0 - no seat
    • 1 - left most seat
    • 2 - the seat to the right of seat 1
    • etc.
    reaction
    string
    uid: Reaction
      Allowed values:
    • "Win"
    • "Lose"
    • "Bored"
    • "Think"
    • "Happy"
    • "Sad"
    • "Angry"
    • "Surprised"
    • "Swag"
    • "Wink"
    • "Etc"
    array<string>
    uid: Event
    Items:
    string
    uid: Event
      Allowed values:
    • "NewGame"
    • "CardsDealt"
    • "FlopDealt"
    • "TurnDealt"
    • "RiverDealt"
    • "PlayerActed"
    • "HeroTurnToPlay"
    • "Showdown"
    • "Collect"
    • "GameOver"
    object
    uid: Hero
    time
    integer

    remaining time for hero to play in seconds

    array<object>
    uid: HeroAllowedAction
    type
    string
    uid: ActionType
      Allowed values:
    • "Raise"
    • "Call"
    • "Fold"
    • "Check"
    • "Bet"
    default_sum
    number
    uid: ChipsSum

    amount of chips

    min_sum
    number
    uid: ChipsSum

    amount of chips

    max_sum
    number
    uid: ChipsSum

    amount of chips

    object
    uid: HeroAction
    type
    string
    uid: ActionType
      Allowed values:
    • "Raise"
    • "Call"
    • "Fold"
    • "Check"
    • "Bet"
    sum
    number
    uid: ChipsSum

    amount of chips

    Additional properties are allowed.

    Additional properties are allowed.

    Additional properties are allowed.

    Additional properties are allowed.

    Examples

    {
  "msg": "state",
  "data": {
    "game": {
      "id": "games/12345678",
      "max_players": 4,
      "small_blind": 100,
      "big_blind": 200,
      "button_seat": 3,
      "hero_seat": 3
    },
    "scene": {
      "background": "scenes/12345678",
      "table": "tables/12345678",
      "deck": "decks/12345678"
    },
    "players_info": [
      {
        "seat": 3,
        "name": "John",
        "avatar": "avatars/12345678",
        "cerebo": "cerebos/12345678"
      }
    ],
    "players_state": {
      "next_player": {
        "seat": 3,
        "time": 5
      },
      "villain": 3,
      "state": [
        {
          "seat": 3,
          "active": true
        }
      ]
    },
    "cards": {
      "public": {
        "flop": [
          "As",
          "Ks",
          "Qs"
        ],
        "turn": [
          "Js"
        ],
        "river": [
          "Ts"
        ]
      },
      "private": [
        {
          "seat": 3,
          "cards": [
            "2h",
            "7d"
          ]
        }
      ]
    },
    "chips": {
      "pot": 120,
      "side_pots": [
        40
      ],
      "table_sum": 30,
      "stacks": [
        {
          "seat": 3,
          "sum": 100
        }
      ],
      "wagers": [
        {
          "seat": 3,
          "sum": 100
        }
      ],
      "collects": [
        {
          "seat": 3,
          "sum": 100,
          "collect_type": "win"
        }
      ]
    },
    "actions": [
      {
        "seat": 3,
        "action": {
          "type": "Raise",
          "sum": 100,
          "fold": true,
          "allin": true
        }
      }
    ],
    "reactions": [
      {
        "seat": 3,
        "reaction": "Win"
      }
    ],
    "events": [
      "NewGame"
    ],
    "hero": {
      "time": 5,
      "allowed_actions": [
        {
          "type": "Raise",
          "default_sum": 100,
          "min_sum": 100,
          "max_sum": 100
        }
      ],
      "suggested_action": {
        "type": "Raise",
        "sum": 100
      }
    }
  }
}
    This example has been generated automatically.

  • PUB hero

    The hero channel.

    Hero publish messages

    Accepts one of the following messages:

    • #0Request time

      Request more time for hero

      object
      msg
      string
        Allowed values:
      • "request_time"
      object

      Additional properties are allowed.

      Additional properties are allowed.

      Examples

      {
  "msg": "request_time",
  "data": {}
}
      This example has been generated automatically.
    • #1Hero action

      Hero performs action in the game

      object
      msg
      string
        Allowed values:
      • "hero_action"
      object
      object
      uid: HeroAction
      type
      string
      uid: ActionType
        Allowed values:
      • "Raise"
      • "Call"
      • "Fold"
      • "Check"
      • "Bet"
      sum
      number
      uid: ChipsSum

      amount of chips

      Additional properties are allowed.

      Additional properties are allowed.

      Additional properties are allowed.

      Examples

      {
  "msg": "hero_action",
  "data": {
    "action": {
      "type": "Raise",
      "sum": 100
    }
  }
}
      This example has been generated automatically.

  • PUB dev

    The dev channel.

    Dev publish messages

    Accepts one of the following messages:

    • #0Restart

      Restarts the current game

      object
      msg
      string
        Allowed values:
      • "restart"
      object

      Additional properties are allowed.

      Additional properties are allowed.

      Examples

      {
  "msg": "restart",
  "data": {}
}
      This example has been generated automatically.
    • #1Replay

      Replays a specific game

      object
      msg
      string
        Allowed values:
      • "replay"
      object
      game_id
      string

      the replayed game ID.

      Additional properties are allowed.

      Additional properties are allowed.

      Examples

      {
  "msg": "replay",
  "data": {
    "game_id": "string"
  }
}
      This example has been generated automatically.

    id

    Game ID.

    integer

    Max number of players on the table.

    The small blind amount.

    big_blind
    number

    The big blind amount.

    button_seat
    integer
    uid: Seat

    A number that indicates the players seat on the table.

    • 0 - no seat
    • 1 - left most seat
    • 2 - the seat to the right of seat 1
    • etc.

    integer
    uid: Seat

    A number that indicates the players seat on the table.

    • 0 - no seat
    • 1 - left most seat
    • 2 - the seat to the right of seat 1
    • etc.

    object
    uid: Cards
    object
    array<string>
    uid: Card
    Items:
    string
    uid: Card

    2 characters string representing a card. Each card is composed of a Rank [23456789JTQKA] and a Suit [shdc]. Examples:

    • 'As' is Ace pf spades.
    • '8h' is the Eight of hearts.

    A unique card is '--' which represents the card's back (a hidden card). An empty string, or null card, means no card.
